@description.name: @description
@description.body:
This class is used to define interfaces (similar to Java interfaces).

See the description of the {@link #define} method how an interface is
defined.

@description.name: @description

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} name of the interface

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
config {Map ? null} Interface definition structure. The configuration map has the following keys:
NameTypeDescription
extendInterface |
Interface[]		Single interface or array of interfaces this interface inherits from.
membersMapMap of members of the interface.
staticsMap Map of statics of the interface. The statics will not get copied into the target class. This is the same behaviour as statics in mixins ({@link qx.Mixin#define}).
propertiesMapMap of properties and their definitions.
eventsMapMap of event names and the corresponding event class name.
@param.description:
Interface definition structure. The configuration map has the following keys:
NameTypeDescription
extendInterface |
Interface[]		Single interface or array of interfaces this interface inherits from.
membersMapMap of members of the interface.
staticsMap Map of statics of the interface. The statics will not get copied into the target class. This is the same behaviour as statics in mixins ({@link qx.Mixin#define}).
propertiesMapMap of properties and their definitions.
eventsMapMap of event names and the corresponding event class name.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns an interface by name

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} class name to resolve

(resolved recursively)

@param.name: @param

@param.description: List of interfaces to be resolved

wrap functions required by interface to
check parameters etc.

@param.description: if false, the method will return a boolean instead of throwing an exception

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Internal helper to detect if the method will be generated by the
property system.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: clazz {Class} The current class.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: methodName {String} The name of the method.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{Boolean} true, if the method will be generated by the property
system.
@return.description:
true, if the method will be generated by the property
system.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Asserts that the given object implements all the methods defined in the
interface. This method throws an exception if the object does not
implement the interface.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: object {qx.core.Object} Object to check interface for

@param.name: @param
@param.body: iface {Interface} The interface to verify

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Checks if an interface is implemented by a class

@param.name: @param
@param.body: clazz {Class} class to check interface for

@param.name: @param
@param.body: iface {Interface} the interface to verify

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
wrap {Boolean ? false} wrap functions required by interface to
check parameters etc.
@param.description:
wrap functions required by interface to
check parameters etc.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Asserts that the given object implements all the methods defined in the
interface.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: object {qx.core.Object} Object to check interface for

@param.name: @param
@param.body: iface {Interface} The interface to verify

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} true if the objects implements the interface
@return.description: true if the objects implements the interface

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Tests whether an interface is implemented by a class, without throwing an
exception when it doesn't.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: clazz {Class} class to check interface for

@param.name: @param
@param.body: iface {Interface} the interface to verify

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
This method will be attached to all interface to return
a nice identifier for them.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Registry of all defined interfaces

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Wrap a method with a precondition check.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
iface {String} Name of the interface, where the pre condition
was defined. (Used in error messages).
@param.description:
Name of the interface, where the pre condition
was defined. (Used in error messages).

@param.name: @param
@param.body: origFunction {Function} function to wrap.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: functionName {String} name of the function. (Used in error messages).
@param.description: name of the function. (Used in error messages).

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
preCondition {Function}. This function gets called with the arguments of the
original function. If this function return true the original function is called.
Otherwise an exception is thrown.
@param.description:
. This function gets called with the arguments of the
original function. If this function return true the original function is called.
Otherwise an exception is thrown.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Validates incoming configuration and checks keys and values

@param.name: @param
@param.body: name {String} The name of the class

@param.name: @param
@param.body: config {Map} Configuration map
